name: RollerMadness (nico80)
description:
RollerMadness

Modifications:

  • Expanded each level to include multiple platforms with ramps to access additional areas.
  • Enemy spawners are located on raised platforms with additional particle effects and matching material to highlight these areas.
  • Added rotating walls that will kill player and enemies on contact
  • Modified the GameManager script to kill enemy spawners when gameState changes to "Death" or "BeatLevel".
  • Changed default Text to TextMeshPro, improving the visual quality of the text.
  • Added shadows to all objects
